sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-form
        ref="form"
        v-model="valid">
        <v-dialog
            :value="dialog"
            @click:outside="closeDialog()"
            @input="$emit('input', $event)">
            <v-card flat outlined class="mt-2 rounded-0">
                <v-card-title>
                    {{ isEdit ? "Edit Plan Details" : "Enter New Plan Details" }}
                </v-card-title>
                <v-card-text>
                    <v-text-field
                        v-model="plan.name"
                        label="Plan Name"
                        :rules="[rules.required]"
                        dense
                        class="rounded-0"
                        outlined>
                    </v-text-field>

                </v-card-text>
                <v-card-text>
                    <v-textarea
                        v-model="plan.description"
                        label="Plan Description"
                        :rules="[rules.required]"

                        dense
                        class="rounded-0"
                        outlined>
                    </v-textarea>
                </v-card-text>
                <v-alert
                    prominent
                    class="warning"
                    light
                    icon="mdi-firework"
                    :value="deleteValidate">Alert
                </v-alert>
                <v-card-actions>
                    <v-btn
                        class="ml-2 mr-3 success rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                        depressed
                        @click="closeDialog()">
                        Copy
                    </v-btn>
                    <v-btn
                        class="error rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                        depressed
                        @click="deleteCheck()">
                        Delete
                    </v-btn>

                    <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                    <v-btn
                        class="mr-3 rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                        light
                        depressed
                        @click="closeDialog()">
                        Cancel
                    </v-btn>
                    <v-btn
                        class="mr-2 success rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                        depressed
                        :disabled="!valid"
                        @click="save">
                        Save
                    </v-btn>
                </v-card-actions>
            </v-card>

        </v-dialog>
    </v-form>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    name: 'PlanEditDialog',
    props: {
        plan: Object,
        dialog: Boolean,
    },
    data() {
        return {
            valid: false,
            deleteValidate: false,
            rules: {
                required: value => !!value || 'Required.',
            }
        }
    },
    computed: {
        isEdit() {
            return this.plan.id > -1 ? true : false
        }
    },
    methods: {
        save() {
            this.$emit("save", this.plan)
        },
        deleteCheck() {
            this.deleteValidate = true
            console.log('deleteValidate:', this.deleteValidate)
            // this.$emit("delete", this.plan)
        },
        closeDialog() {
            this.$emit("close-dialog")
        },
    },
    updated() {
        this.$refs.form.resetValidation()
    }
}
</script>
